name: Xxzhou
body:
# xxzhou
xxzhou博客

执行这个之前需要安装maven客户端包，才能使用mvn命令
http://maven.apache.org/  
下载：apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz
[root@node2 zxx_software]# tar xzvf apache-maven-3.3.9-bin.tar.gz
移动位置到正规路径
[root@node2 zxx_software]# mv  apache-maven-3.3.9 /usr/local/   拷贝到自己指定的文件夹

vi /etc/profile 编辑添加：
MAVEN_HOME=/usr/local/apache-maven-3.3.9
export MAVEN_HOME
export PATH=${PATH}:${MAVEN_HOME}/bin
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
